text: Growing Pains is an American situation comedy that aired beginning in 1985 and ended in 1992. The show focused on an upper middle class family who had three children together. Joanna Kerns played Maggie Seaver and Tracey Gold played Carol Seaver. Carol Seaver's boyfriend, Sandy, played by Matthew Perry passed away in a DUI accident. title: Growing Pains
